{"id":462625130,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"2 years, 3 months","timestamp":1614701369,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"96 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/462625130/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"40.5 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {number[]} nums\n * @return {number}\n */\nvar pivotIndex = function(nums) {\n    let total = 0;\n    let left = 0;\n    \n    for (let i = 0; i<nums.length; i++) {\n        total += nums[i];\n    }\n    \n    for (let i = 0; i<nums.length; i++) {\n        if (i != 0) {\n            left += nums[i-1];\n        }\n        if (total - left - nums[i] == left) {\n            return i;   \n        } \n        \n    }\n    \n    \n    \n    return -1;\n    \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
